message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10. I'm sure you'll appreciate the gesture.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 65/35 split.  Time is ticking, and this offer won't last.
Bob, I understand time is ticking, but let's be fair.  60/40 is a more equitable split, considering the inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm proposing 60/40 to end this now. Don't let greed make us both losers.
